mapper.sql: id, title, description, type, expired_flag, start_date, end_date, status, create_date, update_date
mapper.insert:
select SEQ_ARTICLE.NEXTVAL from dual
insert into t_vote
title,
description,
type,
expired_flag,
start_date,
end_date,
status,
create_date,
update_date,

mapper.update:
update t_vote
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=BIT},
expired_flag = #{expiredFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_vote set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, expired_flag = #{expiredFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
